full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Legal Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** W6399-22CA54/A
* **Solicitation Number:** W6399-22CA54/A
* **Call Number:** PW-_KIN-655-8704
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-27
* **Closing Date:** 2022-11-14T14:00:00
* **Open Status:** Expired

## Contract Information

* **Contract Entity Name:** Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contract Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 Canada
* **End User Entity Name:** Department of National Defence
* **End User Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2 Canada

## Trade Agreements

* The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Delivery Information

* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Delivery Dates:** Above-mentioned

## Tender Criteria and Information

* The tender is for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the following categories:
	+ 1 X G.9 Geographic Information System System Architect (Level 3)
	+ 1 X I.10 Technical Architect (Level 3)
	+ 1 X I.9 Systems Administrator(Level3)
	+ 1 X A.7 Programmer Analyst (Level 3)
* A total of 10 suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal.

## Request for Proposal Instructions

* Tender submissions must be presented in either English or French.
* Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Patrick Semple
*
